item.title: Schedule
item.description: Week Date Topic Prepare AE Lab Exam Project 1 Mon Jun 27 Intro to R ae01 1 Tue Jun 28 Visualization I lab1 1 Thu Jun 30 Visualization II lab2 2 Mon Jul 04 NO CLASS: Independence Day 2 Tue Jul 05 Simple Linear Regression lab3 2 Thu Jul 07 Multiple linear regression No lab: exam01 released exam01 3 Mon Jul 11 Multiple linear regression II exam01 due 3 Tue Jul 12 Logistic regression Regression project: workday 3 Thu Jul 14 Random variables lab4 4 Mon Jul 18 Distributions 4 Tue Jul 19 Simulation-based inference I lab5 4 Thu Jul 21 Simulation-based inference II [Final project: workday] 5 Mon Jul 25 Hypothesis testing I 5 Tue Jul 26 Hypothesis testing II lab6 5 Thu Jul 28 Central Limit Theorem (CLT) Final project: peer-review 6 Mon Aug 01 Regression + inference 6 Tue Aug 02 Data science ethics lab7 6 Thu Aug 04 Special topic: Cryptanalysis Final project: workday
